script: Why is this restaurant so popular?
options: On the corner of Fourth and Main.
Because they hired a new chef.

script: When does the park close?

options: Leave the box at the door, please.
The yellow one down the street.

script: Excuse me, how do I get to platform six?
options: There's a map over there on the wall.

script: Who's responsible for ordering equipment?
What was wrong with the refrigerator?
options: On the right side of the road.

script: This document needs a signature before it's sent out.
Why do you have so much luggage?
options: Because I'll be traveling for six months.

script: You must be the new sales director, right?
options: Yes, it's nice to meet you.
Sorry, I don't have the directions.

script: Are you running the workshop in the morning or in the afternoon?
When should I return your book?
Where can I find the event schedule?
I'll be late to the luncheon if I take the eleven o'clock bus.
options: I have room in my car.
Sure, Heidi can make some now.

script: How many shipments are we sending out every day?
options: No, I'll make it on time.

script: Should we replace the insulation in the building?
options: My office is 34C, near the lobby.
Well, I have considered retiring soon.

script: Do we have to stop at the post office?
options: No, the mail carrier picked up the letter.
Can you call me a taxi, please?

script: Hasn't Alan seen the doctor yet?
Did you correct the error in the spreadsheet?
options: Actually, I fixed a few things.

script: Don't you want to come with us to the art gallery opening tonight?
options: I have a presentation tomorrow morning.
The prices are marked on the frames.

script: Does your restaurant buy vegetables from wholesalers or local farmers?
options: This table seats five people comfortably.

script: Who supplies your copy paper?
options: No, I don't have an extra copy.

script: Could you take a look at my article before I submit it?
options: I do have some editing experience.

script: Let me look into renting a storage unit for this furniture.
options: Put the leftover soup in the refrigerator.

script: Will the Henderson invoice be ready for review this afternoon?
Would you like a beverage while you wait for our loan specialist?
options: Do you think I'll be waiting very long?
Yes, we have a special on shoes.
